name: Ribbon of Rust
description:
Solo effort to put together a tape player that could be used to remix or "intentionally break" the tape of reality, which would move items around or affect the world directly. The video shows all that there is to see at the moment.

If you do download this, it is only set up for a wired PS4 controller. Left trigger is for looking at the tape player while cross pauses, square plays, triangle rewinds, and circle fast forwards the tape. Standard FPP movement.
